name: eBay UK Clean 2014 v2.3 (ad-blocker)
description:
This style will hide the "Popular on eBay" right side panel on the search results page and a few others, see full list below. 
For best results use the Adblock Plus Firefox/Chrome add-on to remove the most common ads since this userstyle was created to remove only these annoying panels that Adblock Plus can't detect.
